text: The Hartford Courant is the largest newspaper in the U.S. state of Connecticut. This newspaper is often considered the oldest continuously- published newspaper in the United States. Its headquarters are in Hartford, though it also serves other places in the area. This newspaper was established in 1764. Category:Newspapers in the United States Courant Category:1764 establishments in the Thirteen Colonies Category:18th-century establishments in Connecticut
title: Hartford Courant
